citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The written avian environment enhancement plan is underdeveloped for the sections regarding social grouping and
environmental enrichment. The birds at the facility were socially housed and were provided with materials to enhance
their environment during inspection. Failure to adequately develop, document and follow a species-appropriate plan for
environment enhancement of regulated birds may result in their poor psychological welfare. Exhibitors must develop,
document and follow a species-appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological
well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by the Attending Veterinarian and must be in accordance with currently
accepted professional standards as cited in appropriate professional journals or reference guides. Correct by ensuring
that a complete, documented plan for environmental enhancement that addresses the required elements and is approved
by the attending veterinarian is maintained and available for inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.154  Repeat
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The written avian environment enhancement plan is underdeveloped for the sections regarding social grouping and 
environmental enrichment. The birds at the facility were socially housed and were provided with materials to enhance 
their environment during inspection. Failure to adequately develop, document and follow a species-appropriate plan for 
environment enhancement of regulated birds may result in their poor psychological welfare. Exhibitors must develop, 
document and follow a species-appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological 
well-being of birds. The plan must be approved by the Attending Veterinarian and must be in accordance with currently 
accepted professional standards as cited in appropriate professional journals or reference guides. Correct by ensuring 
that a complete, documented plan for environmental enhancement that addresses the required elements and is approved 
by the attending veterinarian is maintained and available for inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
